name: ngo
label::English: 1.0 Please select the name of your organization
hint::English: To be filled in by enumerator

name: ngo_other
label::English: 1.1 If other, please specify
hint::English: To be filled in by enumerator

name: enumerator_num
label::English: 2. Please record your enumerator number
hint::English: To be filled in by enumerator

name: governorate_mcna
label::English: 3. Current Governorate
hint::English: To be filled in by enumerator

name: cluster_location_id
label::English: 4. What is the ID number of your Location?
hint::English: To be filled in by enumerator

name: hhh
label::English: 5.0 Are you the head of household?
hint::English: A household is a group of people who regularly share meals, income, and expenditures together. Members must acknowledge the authority of one person as head of household and that person must actually live with the rest of the household members. In polygamous households, each wife is treated as a distinct household when the wives live in different houses, cook separately and take decisions independently.

name: will_to_response
label::English: 5.1 If no, are you willing and able to respond to the questions on behalf of the household?

name: age_respondent
label::English: 6. What is your age?
constraint_message:English: Age cannot be below 18 and above 120

name: gender_respondent
label::English: 7. Respondent's sex

name: consent
label::English: 8. Hello, my name is __ and I work for REACH initiative. We are conducting interviews in order to inform the humanitarian response in Iraq. This interview will take around 45 minutes,  and your answers will remain anonymous and you are free to withdraw at any moment during the survey. The information you provide us will be used in reports and factsheets and shared with humanitarian decision-makers in Iraq. Do you agree to participate?

name: household_profile
label::English: Household Profile

name: displace_status
label::English: 9. Was your household living in this location prior to January 2014?

name: displace_status_returnee
label::English: 10. Have you been displaced from this location since January 2014?

name: note_returnee
label::English: This household is a returnee household.

name: note_host
label::English: This household is part of the host community.

name: displace_status_idp
label::English: 11. Did you move to this location because of the conflict?

name: note_idp
label::English: This household is an IDP household.

name: note_inelegible
label::English: This household is not eligible for the MCNA - please end the survey and find an eligible household in the targeted category. Please cancel this form and move to the next household.

name: return_date_returnee
label::English: 12. When did you return to this location after your most recent incidence of displacement?

name: return_durationdisplace
label::English: 13. For how many months were you displaced?
hint::English: The answer has to be between 0 and 60 months

name: displace_date_idp
label::English: 14. When were you initially displaced from your location?

name: idp_first_place
label::English: 15. Is this location your first place of displacement?
hint::English: Place of displacement should not include transit areas. Displacement implies settling down somewhere (in or out of camp).

name: arrival_date_idp
label::English: 16. When did you arrive to this current location?

name: governorate_origin
label::English: 17. What governorate in Iraq were you living in before your displacement (forced to leave your home)?

name: district_origin
label::English: 18. What district in Iraq were you living in before your displacement?

name: displaced_again
label::English: 19. Have you been back to your AoO or tried to go back, but then decided to displace again in the 12 months prior?

name: intentions
label::English: Intention survey

name: movement_intentions
label::English: 20. What are your household's current movement intentions for the next three months?

name: movement_intentions_b
label::English: 21. What are your household's current movement intentions for the next three months?

name: movement_intentions_b12
label::English: 22. What are your household's current movement intentions for the next twelve months?

name: movement_intentions_ret
label::English: 23. What are the main reasons you would consider displacement again?

name: movement_intentions12
label::English: 24.0 What are your household's current movement intentions for the next 12 months?

name: reason_to_return_to_aoo
label::English: 24.1 What are the main reasons why you currently intend to return to your area of origin? (Select max 3)
constraint_message:English: You cannot select more than 3 options.

name: why_not_return
label::English: 24.2 If not intending to return within the next year, why not? (select max. 3)
constraint_message:English: You cannot select more than 3 options. You cannot select "do not know" or "decline to answer" and any other options.

name: household_roster
label::English: Household Roster

name: num_hh_member
label::English: 38. How many members are there in your household?
hint::English: A household is a group of people who regularly share meals, income, and expenditures together. Members must acknowledge the authority of one person as head of household and that person must actually live with the rest of the household members. In polygamous households, each wife is treated as a distinct household when the wives live in different houses, cook separately and take decisions independently.

name: ind_level
label::English: I will now ask you some questions regarding each individual of your family. We define family to include anyone who is under guardianship or responsibility of this family (e.g. separated or unaccompanied children, grandparents)? **Please start with the head of your family and please don't forget to include yourself!**

name: num_family_member
label::English: 39. How many members are there in your family?
hint::English:
A group of two parents and their children living together as a unit, as well as any individuals under the guardianship or responsibility of this family.
If the respondent is not the head of household make sure the head of household is included in the roster.

name: composition
label::English: Family Composition

name: member
label::English: Add a new group for each family member.

name: relationship
label::English: 40. What is [this person]'s relation to the head of household?

name: error_start
label::English: Is not an error

name: sex
label::English: 41. What is the sex of [this person]?

name: age
label::English: 42. What is the age of [this person]?

name: marital_status
label::English: 43. What is [this person]'s marital status, including customary marriage?

name: pregnant_lactating
label::English: 44. Is the person pregnant or lactating?

name: health_issue
label::English: 45.0 In the past 30 days, did the person suffer from any of the following health conditions?

name: health_issue_other
label::English: 45.1 if other, please describe

name: disabilities
label::English: 46.0 Which difficulties does [this person] have?

name: difficulty_seeing
label::English: 46.1 Does [this person] have difficulty seeing, even if wearing glasses?

name: difficulty_hearing
label::English: 46.2 Does [this person] have difficulty hearing, even if using a hearing aid?

name: difficulty_walking
label::English: 46.3 Does [this person] have difficulty walking or climbing steps?

name: difficulty_remembering
label::English: 46.4 Does [this person] have difficulty remembering or concentrating?

name: difficulty_washing
label::English: 46.5 Does [this person] have difficulty with (self-care, such as) washing all over or dressing?

name: difficulty_communicating
label::English: 46.6 Using your usual (customary) language, does [this person] have difficulty communicating, for example understanding or being understood?

name: disab_explos
label::English: 47. Is [this person's] difficulty related to an explosive hazard (i.e. mines, UXO, IED)?
relevant: (selected(${difficulty_seeing},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_seeing},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_hearing},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_hearing},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_walking},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_walking},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_remembering},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_remembering},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_washing},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_washing},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_communicating},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_communicating},'cannot_do_at_all')) and (${age} >= 5)

name: difficulty_accessing_services
label::English: Does [this person] face difficulties in accessing any basic services (e.g education, health clinics, markets, etc.)
relevant: (selected(${difficulty_seeing},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_seeing},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_hearing},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_hearing},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_walking},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_walking},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_remembering},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_remembering},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_washing},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_washing},'cannot_do_at_all') or selected(${difficulty_communicating},'a_lot_of_difficulty') or selected(${difficulty_communicating},'cannot_do_at_all')) and (${age} >= 5)

name: why_difficulty
label::English: 48.1 If yes, what is the main reason preventing them to access services?

name: why_difficulty_other
label::English: 48.2 if other, please describe

name: attend_formal_ed
label::English: 49. Is the person (6-17) currently attending school? (during school season)

name: attend_informal_ed
label::English: 50. Is the person (6-17) currently attending a non-formal learning environment at least 3 days per week? (during school season)

name: ever_attend
label::English: 51. Has the person (6-17) ever attended school?

name: drop_out
label::English: 52. In what month and year did this person stop attending school?

name: work
label::English: 53. Is [this person] currently working or contributing to household income?

name: actively_seek_work
label::English: 54. Is [this person] actively seeking work?

name: calc_note
tot_calc_note
label::English:
Total number of male: ${tot_male}
Total number of female: ${tot_female}

name: ref_child
label::English: There may be one or more separated or unaccompanied children living in this household. Please refer to the appropiate actor.

name: reasons_not_attend
label::English: 56.0 If one of the persons (6-17) does not attend school, what were the reasons?

name: no_school_no_docs
label::English: 55. For those children not attending school, was it because of lack of civil documentation?

name: resons_not_attend_other
label::English: 56.1 if other, please describe

name: employment_primary_barriers
label::English: 57.0 What obstacles, if any, are people in this household facing in finding work?

name: employment_primary_barriers_other
label::English: 57.1 if other, please describe

name: protection
label::English: Protection survey

name: hh_dispute
label::English: 25. Is the property you are currently living in, or own elsewhere, under any kind of dispute?
hint::English: A dispute is if someone is contesting ownership over the property.

name: property_damaged
label::English: 26.0 Was housing, land or property that you own damaged during the conflict?

name: applied_compensation
label::English: 26.1 Have you applied for housing, land or property compensation?

name: received_compensation
label::English: 26.2 Have you received any cash from the government as a result of your housing, land or property compensation application?

name: previously_evicted
label::English: 36. Was your household at any time evicted from a previous place of housing in the past year?

name: own_land
label::English: 37. Does your household own or have rights over agricultural land?

name: missing_documents_household
label::English: Missing documents houshold

name: note_missing_documents_household
label::English: 27.0 Does your household have the following documents? This means you have it, it is valid, and it is stored in a secure place.

name: pds
label::English: 27.1 PDS card

name: info_card
label::English: 27.2 Information card

name: death_certificate
label::English: 27.3 Death certificate

name: guardianship
label::English: 27.4 Guardianship certificate

name: inheritance
label::English: 27.5 Inheritance deed

name: trusteeship
label::English: 27.6 Trusteeship certificate

name: missing_documents_above_18
label::English: Missing documents above 18
hint::English: For EVERY person in HH ABOVE 18!

name: note_missing_documents_above_18
label::English: 28.0 Does every person above 18 in your household have the following documents? This means you have it, it is valid, and it is stored in a secure place.

name: passport_a18
label::English: 28.1 Passport

name: id_card_a18
label::English: 28.2 National ID card

name: citizenship_a18
label::English: 28.3 Citizenship certificate

name: birth_cert_a18
label::English: 28.4 Birth certificate

name: school_cert_a18
label::English: 28.5 School certificate

name: marriage_cert_a18
label::English: 28.6 Marriage license

name: divorce_cert_a18
label::English: 28.7 Divorce license

name: missing_documents_under_18
label::English: Missing documents under 18
hint::English: For EVERY person in HH UNDER 18!

name: note_missing_documents_under_18
label::English: 29.0 Does every person under 18 in your household have the following documents? This means you have it, it is valid, and it is stored in a secure place.

name: passport_u18
label::English: 29.1 Passport

name: id_card_u18
label::English: 29.2 National ID card

name: citizenship_u18
label::English: 29.3 Citizenship certificate

name: birth_cert_u18
label::English: 29.4 Birth certificate

name: marriage_cert_u18
label::English: 29.6 Marriage license

name: divorce_cert_u18
label::English: 29.7 Divorce license

name: birth_cert_missing_amount_u1
label::English: 30.0 If no, how many persons under 1 year don't have their birth certificate?
constraint_message:English: Number cannot be bigger than household size

name: birth_cert_missing_amount_a1
label::English: 30.1 If no, how many persons between 1 and 17 year don't have their birth certificate?
constraint_message:English: Number cannot be bigger than household size

name: id_card_missing_amount
label::English: 31.0 If no, how many persons under 18 don't have their national ID?
constraint_message:English: Number cannot be bigger than household size

name: ref_docs
label::English: 31.1 Would you like us to get your contact information to refer you to legal support services?
relevant: not(selected(${passport_a18}, 'yes') or selected(${id_card_a18}, 'yes') or selected(${citizenship_a18}, 'yes') or selected(${birth_cert_a18}, 'yes') or selected(${passport_u18}, 'yes')  or selected(${passport_u18}, 'no_one') or selected(${id_card_u18}, 'yes') or selected(${id_card_u18}, 'no_one') or selected(${citizenship_u18}, 'yes') or selected(${citizenship_u18}, 'no_one'))

name: referral_contact
label::English: 31.2 Referral, name and contact information

name: restrictions
label::English: 32.0 In the past month, has anyone in your HH experienced restrictions in their ability to move freely in your area in day light?

name: restriction_clearance
label::English: 32.1 Needing to obtain security clearance / coupons

name: restriction_documents
label::English: 32.2 Needing to show ID documents to civilian authorities or security actors

name: restriction_time
label::English: 32.3 Time restrictions on when to leave and return

name: restriction_reason
label::English: 32.4 Needing to provide a specific reason for movement (employment, medical, school)

name: restriction_physical
label::English: 32.5 Physical road blocks

name: restriction_other
label::English: 32.6 Other

name: restriction_type_other
label::English: 32.7 If other, please specify
constraint_message:English: You cannot select more than 3 options.

name: unsafe_areas
label::English: 33.0 What areas do women and girls in your community avoid or feel unsafe?

name: family_separated
label::English: 33.10 Is anyone in your family separated because of the 2014 conflict?

name: family_separated_reunification
label::English: 33.11 If yes, have you/they taken steps to facilitate reunification?

name: voting_eligibility
label::English: 33.12 Is every eligible person over 18 registered to vote in your household?

name: food_security
label::English: Food security survey

name: fcs
label::English: 58.0 Over the last 7 days, how many days did your household consume the following food?

name: cereals
label::English: 58.1 Cereals, grains, roots and tubers: rice, pasta, bread, potato,

name: nuts_seed
label::English: 58.2 Legumes / nuts : beans, peanuts, lentils, nut, soy, and / or other nuts

name: milk_dairy
label::English: 58.3 Milk and other dairy products: fresh milk / sour, yogurt, cheese, other dairy products (Exclude margarine / butter or small amounts of milk for tea / coffee)

name: meat
label::English: 58.4 Meat, fish and eggs: goat, beef, chicken, fish, including canned tuna, and / or other seafood, eggs (meat and fish consumed in large quantities and not as a condiment)

name: vegetables
label::English: 58.5 Vegetables and leaves: spinach, onion, tomatoes, carrots, peppers, green beans, lettuce, cabbages, egg plants, etc

name: fruits
label::English: 58.6 Fruits: banana, apple, lemon, mango, watermelon, apricot, peach, pineapple, passion, gishta, orange, avocado, wild fruits etc

name: oil_fats
label::English: 58.7 Oil / fat / butter: vegetable oil, palm oil, margarine, other fats / oil

name: sweets
label::English: 58.8 Sugar, or sweet: sugar, honey, jam, cakes, candy, cookies, pastries, cakes and other sweet (sugary drinks)

name: spices_condiments
label::English: 58.9 Condiments / Spices: tea, coffee / cocoa, salt, garlic, spices, yeast / baking powder, lanwin, tomato / sauce, meat or fish as a condiment, condiments including small amount of milk / tea coffee.

name: food_source
label::English: 59.0 What was the main source of the following food in the past 7 days? (do not read out list)

name: cereals_source
label::English: 59.1 Cereals, grains, roots and tubers: rice, pasta, bread, potato,

name: nuts_seed_source
label::English: 59.2 Legumes / nuts : beans, peanuts, lentils, nut, soy, and / or other nuts

name: milk_dairy_source
label::English: 59.3 Milk and other dairy products: fresh milk / sour, yogurt, cheese, other dairy products (Exclude margarine / butter or small amounts of milk for tea / coffee)

name: meat_source
label::English: 59.4 Meat, fish and eggs: goat, beef, chicken, , fish, including canned tuna, and / or other seafood, eggs (meat and fish consumed in large quantities and not as a condiment)

name: vegetables_source
label::English: 59.5 Vegetables and leaves: spinach, onion, tomatoes, carrots, peppers, green beans, lettuce, cabbages, egg plants, etc

name: fruits_source
label::English: 59.6 Fruits: banana, apple, lemon, mango, watermelon, apricot, peach, pineapple, passion, gishta, orange, avocado, wild fruits etc

name: oil_fats_source
label::English: 59.7 Oil / fat / butter: vegetable oil, palm oil, margarine, other fats / oil

name: sweets_source
label::English: 59.8 Sugar, or sweet: sugar, honey, jam, cakes, candy, cookies, pastries, cakes and other sweet (sugary drinks)

name: spices_condiments_source
label::English: 59.9 Condiments / Spices: tea, coffee / cocoa, salt, garlic, spices, yeast / baking powder, lanwin, tomato / sauce, meat or fish as a condiment, condiments including small amount of milk / tea coffee.

name: cereals_source_other
label::English: 59.10 If other, please describe

name: nuts_seed_source_other
label::English: 59.11 If other, please describe

name: milk_dairy_source_other
label::English: 59.12 If other, please describe

name: meat_source_other
label::English: 59.13 If other, please describe

name: vegetables_source_other
label::English: 59.14 If other, please describe

name: fruits_source_other
label::English: 59.15 If other, please describe

name: oil_fats_source_other
label::English: 59.16 If other, please describe

name: sweets_source_other
label::English: 59.17 If other, please describe

name: spices_condiments_source_other
label::English: 59.18 If other, please describe

name: coping_strategies_index
label::English: 60.0 During the last 7 days, how many times (in days) did your household have to employ one of the following strategies to cope with a lack of food or money to buy it?

name: cheaper_quality
label::English: 60.1 Shifting toward cheaper and less quality food items.

name: borrowing
label::English: 60.2 Borrowing food or asking assistance from relatives and friends

name: reduce_meals
label::English: 60.3 Reducing the number of daily meals

name: less_food
label::English: 60.4 Consume less food during meals

name: less_adult
label::English: 60.5 Curbing the adult's need to ensure food need of children

name: coping_strategies_food2
label::English: Coping Strategies Food

name: livelihood_strategies
label::English: 61.0 During the past 30 days, did anyone in your household have to do one of the following things because there was not enough food or money to buy it?

name: selling_assets
label::English: 61.1 Selling household properties (refrigerator, television, jewelry…)

name: borrow_debt
label::English: 61.2 Buying food on credit or through borrowed money from relatives and friends

name: selling_transportation_means
label::English: 61.3 Selling means of transport (car, motorbike

name: child_dropout_school
label::English: 61.4 Children dropout from school

name: reduce_spending
label::English: 61.5 Reducing expenditure on non-food items (health, education)

name: spending_savings
label::English: 61.6 Spending savings

name: change_place
label::English: 61.7 Changing place of residence and accommodation to reduce expenses

name: adult_risky
label::English: 61.8 Accepting that adults engage in risky behavior

name: child_work
label::English: 61.9 Children under 18 work to provide resources

name: family_migrating
label::English: 61.10 Whole family are migrating

name: child_forced_marriage
label::English: 61.11 Children or adult forcefully marriaged
Health survey

name: health_group
label::English: Health

name: distance_health_service
label::English: 62. How far is the closest functioning, accessible health clinic to your location?
hint::English: 30 minutes walking = 2 km (approximately)

name: distance_hospital
label::English: 63. How far is the closest functioning hospital to your location?
hint::English: 30 minutes walking = 2 km (approximately)

name: hospital_emergency_ser
label::English: 64. Does it provide emergency services?

name: hospital_maternity_ser
label::English: 65. Does it provide maternity services?

name: hospital_surgical_ser
label::English: 66. Does it provide surgical services?

label::English: 67. Does it provide pediatric services?

label::English: 68.0 Do women of reproductive age (12-49) have access to specialized reproductive health services?

name: primary_health_provider_pregnant_other
label::English: 68.1 if other, please specify

name: hh_member_distress

constraint_message:English: Number cannot be bigger than household size

constraint_message:English: Number cannot be bigger than household size
